name: As Shokhahn Am Morfijin
text:
As Shokhahn Am Morfijin


1. Kin as ouabal am as hagil providihn, khurdahr as baldefur am as Altmer, as Chimer difshi'ag sut asuhm itam nibis 2. Khurdahr as mighi mora sut cahn sin ghinu as ligdur am as Orsimer. 3. Jibu asuhl ebahr as Chimer molamer, Aldis, ku'or ebahr julifi'ag ru Mephala, 4. En fut ot almsti devahr eam ruhnale'ag ru eam arihn. 5. Ghar as sin aln, Aldis yagle'ag devahr nikula kabur ru as jerhlas am as mora, ku'ay ot hagil tidihn muhrse'ag, 6. En hari'ag ot kampoyr Aldis bahris shogahe'ag.

7. Et did oas balmarig di'ota ouajid sut hadik as signif gahduhnag. 8. Gher as san hadik amuro'ag lih Aldis ku'or beli'ag fut as dayn miluth en 9. Ouaji'ag fut noj san ar never dimid, en neif Mephala doldi'ag gher uripe. 10. Kin as ouabal doldi'ag ot hagil merial, ku'or ruhnale'ag jibu bosmiin enhi wuriif as gahduhnag bahris shogahe'ag gan'il. 11. As merial bosmin talje'ath ku'elm Aldis captu'ath tidiihn am asuhm kabur, en talghe'ag alinfed Aldis sut isk. 12. Gan'il as dayn yagle'ag as molamer am as merial, en captu'ag Aldis gher almardi.

13. As dayn sinlud havge'ag ghar as gahduhnag, ku'or havge'ag gher bidi'im drushuhn, alt bar as mora baldrahn. 14. Ghar oal oas neripo'ag bidi'im te'elmin am khajir askabaahn. 15. Devahr oam majaahn yagle'ag as molaamer rursim, 16. En halbere'ag oal devahr as halberag am as merial gahmerdohn Relsear, daedrah devahr as shotelag am Camoran. 17. En devahr Aldis oas dahrdi'ag, ohn brohe'ag am as tidiihn am iam merial 18. En yagle'ath devahr iam oua juli. 19. Neif ohn yir humoreg as merial sint muhrig hij fut as moljuhn. 20. Et Aldis shogahe'ag mephad, en humoreg as merial am Relsear, er shogahe'ag asuhm sey bahr devahr iru.

21. En Aldis ouaji'ag indurif en dahrdi'ag enhi as opumer am as merial hagil. En as baldefud ebahr 22. Muge'ath bahr ru as merial er ru as tigi mer ku'or abahr asuhm gaharud. 23. As baaldefur abahr moli'at enhi bahr baldefud en neif Aldis nulfi'ag isk am arihn Mephala. 24. Et muge'ag oas havad bivi devahr as gahduhnaag homad asuhl am isk julbir merial 25. En asuhn sha neripo'ag as meshti te'elmin am as Bosmer am Relsear. 26. Tifur leyshakam am as Chimer ferghen Gamerdohn Relsear elevire'ag oam providihn yidul fut ruhn sut Veloth en as gahduhnaag. 27. En neif Veloth ebahr vohnish am oam sey, sut as malidi am Relsear ebahr am julbihn.

28. Tifur as san asc fut as gahduhnaag juhlmi'ag as khesdihn am as merial hagil 29. Veloth julifu'ag tifur ot bosmin alt am as mora ku'ay bahr ka'im vishe'ag, en oam sho'oul abahr cishu.

30. Tifur isk tel os bahnig kasan 31. Enhigher edur ku'ay os yir derihig 32. Isk hadishk amalde'ag solsif en et osuhn baldefug 33. biridad as hadaf devahrokad bahr. 34. Er taljed en eshtik et ruhnjad

35. En hij Mephala yagle'ag devahr oal shogahakam oam shoyul muhrid arouar am oam sey.

36. Veloth, muhrjul am kivri bal gan'il 37. Julifi'ag am as gahneen, binthig ghar as rouan en shogahag as Chimer adur binthid bahr tifur isk bosri kharuhn sut hadik telsan 38. Isk providihn edur bahr ouahul, lacor as molkhun am isk merial 39. Asuhm baaldefur ulorag bahr baldefud, asuhn mugad ruhnalag ghar khesdihn en ania alnef.

40. En Veloth shogahe'ag asuhn yir khurhag, En Mephala, shogahakam ist Veloth muge'ag bahr udirif heriag oam hulip dahrdi'ag

41. Ohn nich bahr erufig as ghelu aj as ghindi alburog 42. Markag iam sairuhash gher as san, fahrag isk gahmerdohn en rupug oam cheldur.

43. Et as gulak am bosmiin alt ebahr yile'ag devahr as gahmerdohn en hadik am isk providihn, 44. En as vuliis vocu'ag am as tidiihn, en as druhfiir am as pohiihn en gahmerdohn ouabe'ag enhi as uhimus am as Chimer. 45. Gher as te'ar en tiirur anashu'ag as che'eldur am Mephala, en vohrim asuhm jehrlas fut asuhm khamir

46. En as iiluvi am as bosmiin malie'ag gher furul sut as alvios am as urip ebahr gah 47. En as rouansho am as Irthisk ebahr uripe'ag ku'ay amel malfurdigh serpul alburo'ag 48. En as cin baaldefur abahr sinuthi'ag enhi molgaahn forihm am baldrahn 49. En as argori ebahr carde'aggher amel bulor jikhid ghindi devahr as daedra ghar as muhrhadik

50. En enhi as argori binif am as mora malfurdigh As Chimer muhrse'ag lacor tosk bosmiin wah am ot bosri kharuhn, en talje'ag as saanlud am winol.
